name: Dark Partner (7 Deadly Sins Series)
description:
!!!WARNING!!! THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND HAS BEEN SPLITTED INTO 2 CHAPTERS.

This is the second game in a series of 7 games each based on one of the 7 deadly sins, this is the game based on the sin of Lust.

Lola found a dating site on the Dark Web and wanted to show her friends.

This site has 4 profils to talk to : Luxuria, Chloe, Daven and Max.

Lola and her friends will end up having a conversation with one of the 4 profils and they will want to come to their house.

Will this be a good idea ? Who is hiding behind these profils ?

Inspired by Luxury Dark.

Made with Ren'py.

CONTROLS :

-SPACE or Left Mouse : Skip Dialogues.
